channel.title: Teton County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Teton County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker on ID-33 east in Idaho. Distance to Teton Village, Jackson, and Casper. All destinations are in Wyoming.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-31
item.description: ID-33 East at ID-31 in Victor. Turn right on ID-31 south for Swan Valley and Idaho Falls. Continue straight on ID-33 for Jackson (Wyoming). Teton Scenic Byway leaves ID-33 here and follows ID-31 south.

item.title: WY-22 East - Teton Pass Restrictions
item.description: Sign listing restrictions on Teton Pass in Wyoming. 60,000 lbs GVW over Teton Pass. 10% grades over Teton Pass. Sign displays WY-22 shield within Idaho.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-32
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-32 north to Ashton. Continue east on ID-33 for Driggs and Jackson (Wyoming). The Teton Mountain Range are in the background. The Teton Scenic Byway follows ID-32 south and turns east onto ID-33 east here.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-32 North
item.description: ID-33 East at ID-32 North. The Teton Scenic Byway joins ID-33 east here. The Teton Range is in the background of the photo.

item.title: ID-33 West - Restricted Truck Route on ID-31
item.description: ID-33 West approaching ID-31. Restricted Truck Route on ID-31.

item.title: ID-31 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-31 south. Distance to Swan Valley, Ririe, and Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-33 West at ID-31 - Victor
item.description: ID-31 west at ID-31 in Victor. Turn left for ID-31 to Swan Valley and Idaho Falls (via US-26). Continue on ID-33 for Driggs.

item.title: ID-33 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-33 west. Distance to Victor, Ashton, and Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-33 West - Teton County
item.description: Entering Teton County on ID-33 west.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-33 West
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on ID-33 West

item.title: ID-33 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker on ID-33 east in Idaho. Distance to Teton Village, Jackson, and Casper.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-31
item.description: ID-33 East at ID-31 in Victor. Turn right on ID-31 south for Swan Valley and Idaho Falls. Continue straight on ID-33 for Jackson (Wyoming). Teton Scenic Byway leaves ID-33 here and follows ID-31 south.

item.title: ID-33 East - Teton Pass Restrictions
item.description: Sign listing restrictions on Teton Pass in Wyoming. 60,000 lbs GVW over Teton Pass; no trailers 11-15 to 4-1. 10% grades over Teton Pass.

item.title: End ID-32 at ID-33
item.description: End ID-32 south at ID-33 near Tetonia. The Teton Scenic Byway continues onto ID-33 east, towards Driggs.

item.title: End ID-32 South at ID-33
item.description: End ID-32 south at ID-33. Use ID-33 west for Rexburg. Use ID-33 east for Driggs and Jackson (Wyoming). Use ID-33 east to continue on the Teton Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-32 South - Teton County
item.description: Entering Teton County on ID-32 South. The Fremont-Teton County Line on ID-32 is at Bitch Creek. The bridge over Bitch Creek was not signed with the creek name.

item.title: ID-33 East - WY-22 Closure Information
item.description: Teton Pass road closure information on ID-33 east approaching the Wyoming state line. When Teton Pass is closed in Wyoming, this is where the road closure starts, just inside of Idaho. All traffic must return to Victor Idaho when the road closure lights are flashing. This is one of the few instances in Idaho of a state highway shield from another state located inside Idaho.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-31
item.description: ID-33 East at ID-31 in Victor. Turn right on ID-31 south for Swan Valley. Continue ahead on ID-33 for Teton Village and Jackson (both in Wyoming). Teton Scenic Byway leaves ID-33 here and follows ID-31 south.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-31
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-32 in Victor. The Teton Scenic Byway turns right here onto ID-31.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-31
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-31. ID-31 between Victor and Swan Valley is a restricted route for trucking.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-32
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-32 north to Ashton. Continue east on ID-33 for Driggs and Jackson (Wyoming). The Teton Mountain Range are in the background. The Teton Scenic Byway follows ID-32 south and turns east onto ID-33 east here.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-32 North
item.description: ID-33 East at ID-32 North. The Teton Scenic Byway joins ID-33 east here. The Teton Range is in the background of the photo.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-32
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-32 in Tetonia. The peaks of the Teton Range are in the background.

item.title: End ID-31 North at ID-33
item.description: End ID-31 north at ID-33. Use ID-33 west for Driggs, and the continuation of the Teton Scenic Byway. Use ID-33 east for Teton Village and Jackson.

item.title: End ID-31 North at ID-33
item.description: End ID-31 north at ID-33.

item.title: Jct. ID-33 on ID-31 North
item.description: Junction ID-33 on ID-31 north.

item.title: ID-31 North - Teton County
item.description: ID-31 north, on the north side of Pine Creek Summit in the Targhee National Forest.
